name: Shirt
description: Relaxed fit collared shirt featuring long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a button-up front.

name: Biker Jacket
description: Cropped jacket made of leather effect. Lapel collar with snap-button detail. Long sleeves with zip cuffs. Front zip pockets and inside pocket detail. Faded effect. Asymmetric metal zip-up front.

name: Sweatshirt
description: Long sleeve hoodie with an adjustable drawstring hood. Featuring contrast prints on the front and back, a front pouch pocket and ribbed trims.

name: Cargo
description: Straight fit jeans. Front pockets and rear patch pockets. Patch pockets with flaps on the legs. Faded effect. Front zip fly and button fastening.

name: Jeans
description: Straight fit jeans with five pockets. Faded effect. Front button fastening.

name: Sneaker
description: Sneakers. Combination of pieces and colours on the upper. Six-eyelet facing. Chunky sole with an irregular design. Slight track sole.
